mapper.select: select id , ctml_name as ctmlName, kpg_algorithm as kpgAlgorithm, is_single as isSingle, is_valid as isValid, sign_cert_key_usage as signCertKeyUsage, sign_cert_extended_key_usage as signCertExtendedKeyUsage, enc_cert_key_usage as encCertKeyUsage, enc_cert_extended_key_usage as encCertExtendedKeyUsage, validity, notes from ra_ctml
mapper.insert: insert into ra_ctml( ctml_name, kpg_algorithm, is_single, is_valid, sign_cert_key_usage, sign_cert_extended_key_usage, enc_cert_key_usage, enc_cert_extended_key_usage, validity, notes )values( #{ctmlName}, #{resKpgAlgorithm}, #{isSingle}, #{isValid}, #{signCertKeyUsage}, #{signCertExtendedKeyUsage}, #{encCertKeyUsage}, #{encCertExtendedKeyUsage}, #{resValidity}, #{notes} )
mapper.update: update ra_ctml set is_valid=#{isValid} where id=#{id}
